Windows 10 is one of the most popular operating systems in the world with millions of users. Although it has some outstanding features, the standard desktop background options can be quite limited. However, the Starter Background Changer software offers a solution by giving Windows 10 users the ability to customise their desktop backgrounds. 

## What is Starter Background Changer?

Starter Background Changer is a popular and free software designed to allow Windows 10 users to change their desktop backgrounds easily. This software offers users an extensive range of options to personalise their desktop, from selecting a single image to multiple backgrounds that change automatically over time. 

## How does it work?

The Starter Background Changer software is easy to install and use. Once you have installed the software on your computer, you can select from a range of wallpapers to customise your desktop. You can choose one image or create playlists to display different wallpapers every hour, day, or week. The software also allows you to crop, scale or rotate your chosen image to fit your screen dimensions. 

## Key features of Starter Background Changer

Some of the key features of the Starter Background Changer software include:

- Customisable desktop backgrounds for Windows 10 users
- Automatic background changes
- Playlist creation and scheduling
- Image scaling, cropping and rotation options
- User-friendly interface
- Completely free

## Benefits of using Starter Background Changer

The Starter Background Changer software offers several benefits to Windows 10 users, including:

- Personalisation: With thousands of wallpapers to choose from, you can customise your desktop to reflect your unique style and preferences.

- Efficiency: The automatic background change feature saves time and ensures that you experience a fresh-looking desktop every day.

- Ease of use: The interface is user-friendly, and the software is easy to install, set up and use.

- Cost-effectiveness: The software is entirely free, saving you money that you could have spent buying custom wallpapers online.

## Conclusion

Starter Background Changer is an excellent software that allows Windows 10 users to customise their desktop backgrounds easily. With its automatic background change feature and user-friendly interface, the software offers users an efficient and straightforward way to personalise their desktops. Moreover, the software is entirely free, making it a cost-effective solution for users who want to enhance their user experience.
